unit.data.pyromancer.name: Pyromancer
unit.data.pyromancer.lore: Powerful <style="value">Fire</style> Mages. Their order is (in)famous for yearning to <style="status">Be One with the Flame</style> and are all suffering from severe burns all across their bodies making them disfigured. They walk around encased in a magic suit to amplify their magic while hiding their hideous figure from prying eyes.
unit.data.pyromancer.combo.2: Gain a <style="value">Red</style> Mana and a <style="value">Red</style> Crystal
unit.data.pyromancer.description.visuals: Short human in full protective gear. Using orange goggles to cover his eyes and a fireman looking hat. Fire is seen everywhere around and behind the suit.
